name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Post ID Finder for Meta Ads

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly locate and copy the Post ID of any Meta Ads with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of manually searching for Facebook Post IDs?

Post ID Finder for Meta ads makes it effortless.

Get the unique ID of any post instantly, boosting your productivity and saving valuable time.

Once you open a post, the extension automatically detects the ID and displays it in a sleek popup. With just one click, you can copy it and use it wherever needed. 

Whether you're a marketer, media buyer, or regular user, this tool is designed to streamline your workflow and enhance your efficiency.

Post ID Finder for Meta ads is the must-have tool for effortlessly managing Facebook posts. Install it now and experience the simplicity of managing your content like never before!

How does it work?

1) Download the extension to your Chrome (or Chromium-based) browser.

2) Bookmark it for easier access (optional).

3) Click on the extension and activate it by checking “Enable Finder”.

4) Go to the publication / ad page with comment and the popup with the Post ID number will appear at the bottom right of your screen.

5) Copy and paste the Post ID into your next Meta campaign!

6) You can disable when you're not working in your ads manager.

It's that simple!

Looking for help managing your Meta Ads campaigns?

Hit us up at www.rawagency.ch and let's chat about how we can boost your Meta ad performance!

Guilherme Soares - Raw Agency
